justification: Identifies B’s conservatism and SoS, but misses key beliefs: B already has strong QBs and prefers possession WRs/volume; swapping Cameron (T2) for Nick (T4) conflicts. A is injury-averse yet is asked to take Doubtful Tyler Anderson; A also values pocket passers but trades away Sam Martinez (T2, friendly playoffs). Rationale is terse and doesn’t address roster redundancies or injury preferences. Trade construction is inconsistent with both managers’ stated priorities.
